About

My name is Christopher Salam and I am a software engineer

My resume can be found at my github.io

I was in the first cohort of Telegraph Academy , an amazing accelerated JavaScript immersive for underrepresented minorities in Berkeley, CA

Open source projects I've worked on lately are:

Katfish: An honest profile program built in React Native and Firebase

Six Dribbles: A Bacon Oracle for NBA players built with a ANNE stack (Angular, Neo4j, Node, and Express)

Video-ke: A dual video player with crossfader powered by Youtube

I work as a freelance developer with Amy Yoshitsu

This website uses jekyll and jekyllNow as a static content generator, used github pages before transitioning to a full static HTML site, and uses d3 to make the posts list in a tree structure.
